data_description.host: The hostname or IP address of the Lutron main repeater.

user.description: Please enter the main repeater login information
user.title: Main repeater setup

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_cannot_conn.title: The Lutron YAML configuration import cannot connect to server
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_cannot_conn.description:
Configuring Lutron using YAML is being removed but there was an connection error importing your YAML configuration.

Make sure your home assistant can reach the main repeater. In case the main repeater is down, try again later.

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_unknown.title: The Lutron YAML configuration import request failed due to an unknown error
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_unknown.description:
Configuring Lutron using YAML is being removed but there was an unknown error while importing your existing configuration.

Setup will proceed with required configuration.
